list.name: M8-template
list.desc: Documentation and Template for an M8 song save file

list.name: png2gb
list.desc: Script that converts a PNG into tiles and a tilemap to build a Game Boy rom that displays the image

list.name: open-io
list.desc: A drop-in replacement for the EXT-IO - a piece of Konami arcade hardware

list.name: MEGA Voltex
list.desc: Arduino Mega 2560 Sound Voltex controller shield for use with [ACreal_IO](https://github.com/Nadeflore/ACreal_IO)

list.name: DK42
list.desc: Working 42%-scale Donkey Kong arcade bartop cabinet. Parts are designed to be 3D Printed.

list.name: NES-101 Multi-out Panel
list.desc: 3D printable replacement AV/Power panel for the NES-101 that includes a proprietary Nintendo multi-out port instead of regular holes for RF out and channel select
